session_summary: James and John conversed at 2:36 pm on 29 April, 2022. John mentioned he is doing freelance programming to improve his coding skills and is working on a website for a local business. Despite facing challenges like setting up payments, he's determined to succeed. James praised John for his progress and shared his interest in fantasy novels. They discussed the book "The Name of the Wind" and strategy games like Civilization VI and Valhalla. James talked about playing a strategy game that tests problem-solving skills and how satisfying it is to win. John brought up enjoying strategy board games and a mystery game with friends. They agreed it's fun to play with others and recommended playing games like the impostor game in large groups for a better experience.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Hey John! What's up? Anything fun going on?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: I'm currently taking on some freelance programming to hone my coding skills. It's challenging, but I'm determined to improve.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Freelancing can definitely be a great way to sharpen skills and gain experience. What projects are you currently working on?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: I'm actually working on a website for a local small business. It's my first professional project outside of class.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Congrats on your first professional project, John! Bet it's been great applying what you learned in class. How's the progress been?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, James! I've learned a lot and it's been an interesting journey so far. Progress is slow and there have been some hiccups along the way.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, nothing ever goes smooth. It's normal to have hiccups, but use them to learn and grow. Push through it and you'll make it!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: You're right, I appreciate the boost. It's tough sometimes but I'm gonna keep pushing and make this work. Hiccups won't stop me.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: What challenges have you encountered?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Figuring out how to get payments on the website was tough. I needed some help so I used some resources to understand the process. It's taken a while, but I'm getting closer to a solution.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a book open to a picture of a male character
conversation_turns.text: That sounds challenging, but you're making progress. Hang in there! By the way, three days ago I bought myself an adventure book with fantasy novels and cool arts.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that art's awesome! It takes me back to reading fantasy books.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, I love this genre. Got any suggestions?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Cool! Heard of "The Name of the Wind"? It's another great novel with awesome writing.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a book set of three books on a wooden table
conversation_turns.text: Never heard of it, but it sounds interesting. I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation, John!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Always happy to help. I'm sure you'll love this trilogy!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a dog laying on a bed with a computer in the background
conversation_turns.query: gaming setup dogs furry gaming buddies
conversation_turns.text: Look, I was playing a game and my faithful furry friend Daisy came and lay down next to me. This is so cute!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Awww, this is really so cute! Your furry friend looks so cozy. Do your dogs often come to you like this while playing?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a blue controller in their hand
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, they love to watch me gaming and often hug me. Such good cuddle buddies! What game have you been playing lately?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Awesome that you have them! I'm currently playing AC Valhalla, it's cool. Are you playing anything new?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a map of the world on a tv screen
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, John! Valhalla is awesome. I'm trying out some strategy games like this. It's different but so cool!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Is that Civilization VI? Heard good things about it. How's it?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a computer screen showing a game of war
conversation_turns.text: This is a high-quality turn-based strategy game where you manage resources, lead armies, and conquer territories - challenging and cool!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: That sounds fun! What's the game like? Does it require a lot of strategy?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Sure, John! It requires a lot of strategy. It's all about planning, managing resources and making good decisions to beat your rivals. Every move matters!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Sounds intense but cool. I like games that test my strategizing. Does it help with your problem-solving?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, it's a great way to work on problem-solving and thinking. Plus, it's awesome to see your plans go the way you wanted and win!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Yeah! It's really satisfying when your plans work out and you win. How long have you been playing this game?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Been playing it for a month now - it's really challenged my strategy skills.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a board game with a lot of cards on it
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that's impressive! I'm really enjoying games like this, they really make me think. What do you think of strategy board games? I played one with friends two days ago, it's very exciting!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Sounds good! Board games are always a blast when you hang out with friends.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Yeah! They're great for having fun together.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Anything else that is fun to play with others?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Yes, we played one game, but I forgot its name. Perhaps you know this game. There were multi-colored cards with numbers. You can only place a card with the same color or number on your opponent's card. Sometimes you trade cards, sometimes you need to draw a few extra from the deck or skip a turn.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I can't remember such a game. Maybe you have some other interesting games?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Yeah for sure! I've been playing one more game with friends these days. It's a game to figure out who the impostors are and it's super fun.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Sounds cool! I've heard of that game, been meaning to try it out.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Go for it, James! I advise you to gather a large group, it will be much more interesting to play.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Sure thing, sounds like fun.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: That really is!
